# Travel funding

```{r, echo=FALSE,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE,error=FALSE}

# table to keep track of travel funding

# total travel funding amount
TOTAL_FUNDING <- 5000

tibble::tribble(
  ~Date, ~Purpose, ~Amount, ~Reimbursed,
  20250630, "Conference 1 costs", 800, "yes",
  20250831, "Conference 2 costs", 1000, "requested"
) |> 
  dplyr::mutate(Date = lubridate::ymd(Date)) |> 
  dplyr::mutate(Remaining = TOTAL_FUNDING - cumsum(Amount), .before = 4) |> 
  knitr::kable()
```
